JUDGES: Julia Laffranque;Nebojša Vučinić;Paul Lemmens;Robert Spano;Stéphanie Mourou-Vikström
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in PERSON ( GPE ) . He was represented before the ORG by Mr Y. Aksaev , a lawyer practising in GPE ( GPE ) .
CARDINAL . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent , PERSON .
CARDINAL . Notified under LAW CARDINAL § CARDINAL ( a ) of the Rules of Court of their right to intervene in the present case , ORG expressed no wish to do so .
CARDINAL . The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
CARDINAL . On an unspecified date the applicant ’s wife filed divorce papers with the competent court in GPE , also seeking the division of property .

CARDINAL . On DATE she applied to ORG ( PERSON ) in GPE ( GPE ) for an interim measure prohibiting the applicant from disposing of CARDINAL apartments ( zabranjuje otuđenje i opterećenje nepokretnosti ) in GPE ( GPE ) until the proceedings in GPE had ended .

CARDINAL . On DATE the court , in the absence of both the applicant and his representative , approved the measure , which was duly registered in the ORG real estate register . On DATE the applicant received the relevant decision , which also contained information that he could appeal to ORG , through the court in GPE , within DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant allegedly sent his appeal by express mail and it was received at ORG ( ORG ) in GPE on DATE by a named court officer . The applicant submitted a copy of a ORG delivery company envelope to the ORG with a date of CARDINAL DATE . It was addressed to ORG in GPE , with a waybill number of CARDINAL - CARDINAL - CARDINAL marked on it .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG found that the applicant had sent his appeal on CARDINAL DATE and rejected it ( odbacio ) as out of time .
CARDINAL . On DATE , the proceedings in GPE ended with a friendly settlement .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant wrote to ORG , maintaining that he had appealed on DATE and had therefore been in time . He enquired about the basis for ORG conclusion that the appeal had been sent on DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE of the CARDINAL ORG judges dealing with the applicant ’s case informed the president of ORG that there was proof in the case file that the appeal had been sent on CARDINAL DATE and that ORG had not taken other documents submitted by the applicant into account , namely “ a receipt , a bill and a fax sent on CARDINAL DATE ” .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant ’s ex - wife waived her rights in respect of the property in GPE and requested that the interim measure be revoked and deleted from the real estate register .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant informed the courts in GPE and GPE about the termination of the proceedings in GPE and requested that the interim measure be revoked .
CARDINAL . On DATE the court in GPE revoked the measure ( ukida se privremena mjera ) .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant tried to sell his property in GPE , but could not as the interim measure was still in the register . It transpired that the court in GPE had not transmitted the relevant decision to the ORG real estate registry .
CARDINAL . On CARDINAL DATE ORG in GPE requested that the real estate registry in GPE delete the measure .

CARDINAL . On DATE the registry issued a decision to strike out the interim measure in respect of CARDINAL of the apartments , which was executed on DATE . On DATE the registry issued a decision to strike out the interim measure in respect of the other apartment , which was executed on DATE .

CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL(CARDINAL ) of LAW ( Zakon o parničnom postupku ; published in ORG . CARDINAL , CARDINAL and CARDINAL , and ORG no . CARDINAL ) provides , inter alia , that submissions sent by post are considered as having been lodged with the relevant court on DATE of posting .
